name: NightMaze (CalibanDJ)
description:
Developed during the Game Jam between ENSEIRB-MATMECA school and MMI Bordeaux school.

The theme was : One night.

Developed in team of 7. (A. GISSAUD,  B. RESEAU, J. DUPUIS, J. LE BREVET, M. BRETON-BOITEL,  M. AURENSAN,  M. RABOUAN)

Development time : 48h

Date : February 2020
